variable.name: cfg_save_userinfo

value.description: Makes cfg_save not save userinfo variables.
Makes cfg_save save all userinfo variables except spectator/name/topcolor/bottomcolor/skin/team .
Makes cfg_save save all userinfo variables like name/team/teamcolor/rate/msg/skin/w_switch/b_switch/... .

variable.remarks: Note :'cfg_save_userinfo 1' is best for teamfortress so you don't get kicked for changing bottom color. Note : cfg_save will never save the password variable, even though technically it is a userinfo variable.
